## Data Collection
Use web-scarping covered in the course. Use R.

```{r}
install.packages('rvest')
```

```{r}
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
site_no <- '08324000'
link <- paste0("https://waterdata.usgs.gov/monitoring-location/", site_no, "/#parameterCode=00060&period=P7D")
(link)

drainage_area <- read_html(link)%>%
                  html_nodes('table') %>% .[2]%>%
                    html_table() %>% .[[1]] 


```
